name: EGaDS! Mega Micro-Jam
description:
Face off against your childhood-friend turned culinary rival, Gordon Ramsbee, in over 25 unique minigames!

Drawing inspiration from the WarioWare series, participants in the EGaDS! Mega Micro-Jam were tasked with creating a short game (3-6 seconds) in under 36 hours for the theme "food". The work of 17 teams and 7 solo jammers was compiled into this big project!

          


Credits Base Project

Base Project Design, Programming & Music - Grant Ross
Base Project Programming - Alex Huang (Twitter)
Base Project Art - Karina Teruya (ArtStation, Instagram) & Terry Nguyen (Twitter)
Music and SFX Resources - Grant Ross, Matthew Zhang, David Lee
